thread.title: This is what 'A Day Without A Woman' means
thread.title_full: This is what 'A Day Without A Woman' means

title: This is what 'A Day Without A Woman' means
text:
—Women's March on Washington On March 8, the organizers behind the historic women’s marches nationwide are making their next big move: A Day Without a Woman .
According to organizers, the purpose of A Day Without a Woman is to recognize the value women add to our socioeconomic system, despite wage battling wage inequality, sexual harassment, and other forms of discrimination. The protest will take place on International Women’s Day.
Ladies can participate in a number of ways:
Take the day off. Women are encouraged to refrain from engaging in both paid and unpaid labor on March 8. Think before you spend. The organizers suggest that participants avoid shopping throughout the day, with exceptions for small, women-, and minority-owned businesses. Wear red clothing to show your support for A Day Without a Woman . For more information on the demonstration, you can visit the A Day Without a Woman website .
